hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT H.CENTROESTUDIOS as "Centroestudios", CES.DESCRIPCION as "auxCentroEstudios", H.IDIOMA as "pkIdioma", H.POSTULANTE as "pkPostulante", H.NIVELLECTURA as "Nivellectura", H.NIVELORAL as "Niveloral", H.NIVELESCRITURA as "Nivelescritura", H.NIVELGENERAL as "Nivelgeneral",
H.ULTIMOUSUARIO as "UltimoUsuario", H.ULTIMAFECHAMODIF as "UltimaFechaModif", I.DESCRIPCIONLOCAL as "auxIdioma", LE.des as "auxNivellectura", ORA.des as "auxNiveloral", ES.des as "auxNivelescritura", GE.des as "auxNivelgeneral", h.anotermino FROM HR_POSTULANTEIDIOMA H INNER JOIN .HR_IDIOMASMAST I ON H.IDIOMA=I.IDIOMA LEFT JOIN (SELECT 'BÁSICO' as des,'B' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'INTERMEDIO' as des,'I' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'AVANZADO' as des,'A' as nivel ) LE ON H.NIVELLECTURA=LE.NIVEL LEFT JOIN (SELECT 'BÁSICO' as des,'B' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'INTERMEDIO' as des,'I' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'AVANZADO' as des,'A' as nivel ) ORA ON H.NIVELORAL=ORA.NIVEL LEFT JOIN (SELECT 'BÁSICO' as des,'B' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'INTERMEDIO' as des,'I' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'AVANZADO' as des,'A' as nivel ) ES ON H.NIVELESCRITURA=ES.NIVEL LEFT JOIN .HR_CENTROESTUDIOS CES ON H.CENTROESTUDIOS = CES.CENTRO LEFT JOIN (SELECT 'BÁSICO' as des,'B' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'INTERMEDIO' as des,'I' as nivel UNION ALL SELECT 'AVANZADO' as des,'A' as nivel ) GE ON H.NIVELGENERAL=GE.NIVEL WHERE H.POSTULANTE = :p_postulante ORDER BY I.DESCRIPCIONLOCAL
